short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All of the Desolo Sub Humus albums and singles, along with an animated background

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Each Desolo Sub Humus album includes (or will include in a future update) a subtle SVG animation which plays for the length of the album. Singles are available for streaming as well, and in a future update, a few select samples recorded by Desolo Sub Humus will be available for downloading and remixing in your own work.

This extension is available for free, includes over 5 hours of music, and requires no permissions. (ðŸš«DRM)

-The install will take a bit longer than many other extensions due to the large size of the extension, but this is because all music, animation, and images will be available to you locally; you will not need an active internet connection or wi-fi to listen to or watch any part of this extension.
